description:
Tucked into a cozy alley in Azabudai, this modern ramen spot offers more than just bowls of noodles. The dishes are rich yet delicate, crafted with the kind of attention to detail you’d expect from an omakase chef. The staff speak English fluently and treat each guest with care, making it especially welcoming for travelers. Expect a relaxed atmosphere, thoughtful service, and a variety of refined offerings.
Note: there is a minimum charge of ¥3,000 per person.

product1.name: Premium Roasted Black Wagyu Ramen
product1.description: 黒毛和牛ローストビーフ塩そば

product2.name: Tengumai
product2.description:
天狗舞 山魔純米大吟釀
「柔らかな口当たり」「心地よい酸味」「選しく膨らむ。自然の乳酸菌を利用した広統的な技法、山廃品造り。天美流の製法により、芳醇で奥深い香味に飲されました。気にこだわる麹由来の自然な色合いは目も楽しませてくれます。

product3.name: Homemade Ice Cream
product3.description:
Homemade, grown-up flavor rum raisin with vanilla ice cream.
自家製の大人味ラムレーズンとヴァニラアイス
